metadata.title: CVE-2024-27044 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/display: Fix potential NULL pointer dereferences in'dcn10_set_output_transfer_func()' The 'stream' pointer is used indcn10_set_output_transfer_func() before the check if 'stream' is NULL.Fixes the below:drivers/gpu/drm/amd/amdgpu/../display/dc/hwss/dcn10/dcn10_hwseq.c:1892dcn10_set_output_transfer_func() warn: variable dereferenced before check'stream' (see line 1875)
